item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 24 Jan 2023
item.description:
1. The Growth of the OCaml (Binary) Distribution
  2. Ocaml 5.0.0 in Pyre - mostly smooth sailing, Gc.stat regression
  3. Adopting the OCaml Code of Conduct
  4. Esperanto, when OCaml meets Cosmopolitan
  5. Looking for Participants for User Survey on ocaml.org Package Documentation and Learn Area
  6. OCaml Software Foundation: January 2023 update
  7. An Emacs mode for Cram tests
  8. Taking a look: some open OCaml Pull Requests
  9. odep initial release
